title: Confirmed: Grand Tour-Smashing Lead Sport Director to Leave Visma-Lease a Bike
content:
'It will be a big loss': Merijn Zeeman to take role with AZ soccer club in 2025 after helping turn Dutch cycling team from minnows to megastars.

Read the full article at Confirmed: Grand Tour-Smashing Lead Sport Director to Leave Visma-Lease a Bike on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
